summary: This is a court notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding case 21-58, United States v. Maxwell. It acknowledges a hearing date for Ghislaine Maxwell's appeal and was electronically filed and served.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the appellant in the case United States of America v. Maxwell, and a notice regarding a hearing date acknowledgment was filed on her behalf.

events.title: Notice of Hearing Date Acknowledgment Filed
events.description: A 'NOTICE OF HEARING DATE ACKNOWLEDGMENT' was filed on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

keyFacts: The document is a court notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case 21-58, United States v. Maxwell.
It records the filing of a 'NOTICE OF HEARING DATE ACKNOWLEDGMENT' on behalf of appellant Ghislaine Maxwell on April 9, 2021.
The document is part of the appellate process following Ghislaine Maxwell's conviction.
